name: vscode-color-json-picker-monorepo
description: vscode color picker from json monorepo
author: tangdaoyuan <1197633750@qq.com> (https://github.com/tangdaoyuan/)

scripts.ext:dev: cd extension && tsup src/extension.ts --external vscode --watch src
scripts.ext:pack: pnpm run ext:build && cd extension && vsce package --no-dependencies
scripts.ext:publish: pnpm run ext:build && cd extension && vsce publish --no-dependencies
